attributes.action: Ban from sale (in the UK) toys that contain small, powerful magnets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regarding the horrific and potentially fatal consequences of children swallowing small, powerful magnets, we the undersigned call on you as Prime Minister of the UK to ban from sale (in the UK)toys that contain small, powerful magnets.

There are many, many websites that describe the terrible dangers that these products pose and that were highlighted in tonight's Channel 4 television programme "Dispatches" (17/12/07).

The consumer organisation ANEC has written to the European Commission in march this year calling for a ban on toys containing magnets but this is not being addressed quickly enough given the potential dangers.
